magazine.latest.title: Latest Articles
magazine.recent.title: Recent Articles
magazine.similar.title: Similar Articles
magazine.random.title: Random Articles
error.404.page_youre_looking_for: I'm sorry, but the page you're looking for was moved or doesn't exist.
error.error.note: I'm sorry, but an error occured and destroyed everything.
theme.custom_meta.simple_title.label: Simple Title
theme.custom_meta.simple_title.comment: A simple title which replaces the main title on each theme slider.
theme.custom_meta.simple_subtitle.title: Simple Subtitle
theme.custom_meta.simple_subtitle.commen: A simple title which is shown above the main title on each theme slider.
theme.custom_meta.post_layout.label: Post Layout
theme.custom_meta.post_layout.comment: Change the Layout how the Post is shown on the frontend.
theme.options.site_name.label: Site Name
theme.options.site_name.comment: The website name as it should appear on the front-end.
theme.options.site_logo.label: Site Logo
theme.options.site_logo.comment: Use your logo instead of the the site name (height should not exceed 40 pixels).
theme.options.site_logo_inverted.label: Inverted Site Logo
theme.options.site_logo_inverted.comment: A color-inverted version of your site logo, used for the dark color scheme.
theme.options.show_demo.label: Use Demonstration Content
theme.options.show_demo.comment: Use the demonstration content for empty template sections.
theme.options.dark_scheme.label: Use Dark Color Scheme
theme.options.dark_scheme.comment: Use the dark color scheme as default one.
theme.options.dark_header.label: Show Dark Header
theme.options.dark_header.comment: Show a dark header and hero section, regardless of the used color scheme.
theme.options.dark_footer.label: Show Dark Footer
theme.options.dark_footer.comment: Show a dark footer section, regardless of the used color scheme.
theme.options.color_primary.label: Primary Color
theme.options.color_secondary.label: Secondary Color
theme.options.color_success.label: Success Color
theme.options.color_info.label: Info Color
theme.options.color_warning.label: Warning Color
theme.options.color_danger.label: Danger Color
theme.options.color_light.label: Light Color
theme.options.color_dark.label: Dark Color
theme.options.sticky_header.label: Use Sticky Header
theme.options.sticky_header.comment: Shows the header always on top of the viewport, when the user scrolls down.
theme.options.color_switch.label: Show Color Switch
theme.options.color_switch.comment: Shows an additional color switch button to change the applied color scheme.
theme.options.languages_menu.label: Show Languages Menu
theme.options.languages_menu.comment: Shows an additional button to switch to a different website language.
theme.options.hero_slider.label: Show Hero Slider
theme.options.hero_slider_category.label: Hero Slider Category
theme.options.hero_slider_category.comme: Select the desired Hero Slider Category, from which the posts should be listed.
theme.options.to_top_button.label: Show To-Top Button
theme.options.to_top_button.comment: Shows an scroll-to-top button after the used scrolled for a specific amount.
theme.options.copyright_text_left.label: Left Copyright Text
theme.options.copyright_text_left.commen: Change the text of the left-aligned Copyright Footer. (Supports Markdown)
theme.options.copyright_text_right.label: Right Copyright Text
theme.options.copyright_text_right.comme: Change the text of the right-aligned Copyright Footer. (Supports Markdown)
theme.options.datetime_format.label: Date/Time Format
theme.options.datetime_format.comment: Valid Date/Time Format as described on php.net
